column1:
So for those of you who know, which should be most of you, I got tested for the Covid-19 Coronavirus. Those results have come back, and the news is not good. 

I have officially been diagnosed with the Covid-19 Coronavirus.

So in short, 2020 is not my year YET. I will be though.
